title: Plan JSON Schema (Extended)
description: Schema for Narratoria Plan JSON documents generated by narrator AI. Version 0.1 includes extended execution semantics (retry, required, async, replan feedback).

requestId.description: Unique identifier for this plan execution (UUID format recommended)

narrative.description: Optional narrative text to display to player

toolId.description: Unique ID for this tool within the plan

input.description: JSON object passed to tool via stdin

dependencies.description: Array of toolId values that must complete first

required.description: If true, tool failure aborts dependent tools; if false, dependent tools continue

async.description: If true, tool may run in parallel with unrelated tools (respecting dependencies)

maxRetries.description: Maximum retry attempts before marking tool as failed

backoffMs.description: Base milliseconds for exponential backoff between retries

parallel.description: Whether tools can run concurrently (if dependencies allow)

disabledSkills.description: Array of skill names that failed in previous execution attempts (planner MUST NOT select these)

metadata.description: Plan metadata for debugging and replan tracking

generationAttempt.description: Which plan generation attempt this represents (1, 2, 3...)

parentPlanId.description: UUID of the previous plan if this is a replan, null otherwise
